title: Super Greens Soup using the Compact Portable Blending/Chopping System
description: Cuisinart's NEW Compact Portable Blending/Chopping System features one touch operation that's hands free for continuous use. With a 350 watt motor and three speeds to choose from you can easily mix sauces, puree soups and crush ice for frozen drinks. The four convenient travel cups are BPA free and ideal for breakfast on the go.

asset.author: Cuisinart Canada

transcripts:
[MUSIC PLAYING]

We're supposed to eat healthy, but who has the time? This piece of equipment will make your life easy and you'll be healthier. This recipe with super green soup is so simple to assemble, I want to show you how it quick it is. A little bit of extra virgin oil, one tablespoon of butter. We got some fresh parsley and some nutritious kale all going in. Chicken stock or vegetable stock. Shallots and garlic and some beautiful fragrant leek. All of this is going to on to the stove. I'm gonna bring it to a simmer. A little bit of pepper, little bit of salt. Now that my soup is slightly cooled, it's ready to plate. I'm going to take a scoop of the chopped kale and some of those beautiful veg. I want to leave a little bit of texture in the soup. The rest is going to go into the blender. I'm going to use the blending blade and see how easily that goes in the base on to the mount. And again, really simple mounting. And I'm going to put some of the heavier chopped pieces on the bottom first. This is warm but don't use hot liquid. The one great thing about this blending system is that it is BPA free so you can use that warm liquid with great confidence. Now that the soup has come together nicely, I can conveniently hang on to this., It's got those groove sides. Pour that over my finished soup and adding that lovely cream. it's just perfect. Little seasoning to finish. A little bit of black pepper and a tiny little bit of salt. Don't forget you can just as easily put this in the to go cup take it with you and you've got a nutritious and healthy alternative to any day.
